::Kluster/Firearm::

"Ok, you got one second to get through," Kluster replies to 
Lunarpine's yell, opening his wrist comp and tapping a few buttons. 
The shields of the CF flicker off and activate one second later, 
regardless of whether Lunarpine was through or not. Barely seeing a 
teetering non-Maximal bot somewhere in front of him, he aims his 
missile launcher and fires two missiles at the bot's torso.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Firearm spins out of the way of the two shots, firing two charges 
down at Drag Strip.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> OOC: np Yan. :)
> 
> ::Drag Strip/Dead-End::
> 
> As the charges come down, Dead-End takes one right in chest and 
> it plasters him to the ground. Drag Strip, dodges back, but not 
fast 
> enough, the charge lands fairly close in front of him, blasting him 
> up, and down into the ground. "Grrr," rumbles Drag Strip, as he 
> gets up and fires his double-barrel plasma gun at Firearm twice.
> 
> Dead-End, who was not so lucky, groans, then gets up teetering a 
> bit.
